mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TBS_DAUPIN_CONFIG.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_DAUPIN_CONFIG ( NO_DAUPIN_COFIG , VAL_LIMIT_PIN , VAL_BRING_PIN , VAL_BRING_PIN_MANUAL , VAL_FIRST_PIN, FG_USE , DT_REG , ID_REG_EMP , DT_UPT , ID_UPT_EMP ) VALUES ( #{NO_DAUPIN_COFIG} , REPLACE(#{VAL_LIMIT_PIN},',','') , REPLACE(#{VAL_BRING_PIN},',','') , REPLACE(#{VAL_BRING_PIN_MANUAL},',','') , REPLACE(#{VAL_FIRST_PIN},',',''), 'Y' , SYSDATE , #{user.id} , SYSDATE , #{user.id} )
mapper.select: SELECT NO_DAUPIN_COFIG , VAL_LIMIT_PIN , VAL_BRING_PIN , VAL_BRING_PIN_MANUAL , VAL_FIRST_PIN FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_DAUPIN_CONFIG WHERE FG_USE = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE CRMADMIN.TBS_DAUPIN_CONFIG SET FG_USE = 'N' , DT_UPT = SYSDATE , ID_UPT_EMP = #{user.id} WHERE FG_USE = 'Y'
mapper.sql:
SELECT CD_COUPON , CD_COUPON_OBJ , NM_COUPON , DS_COUPON , NO_COUPON_ORDER , TP_EXPIRY_DATE , TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY_START , TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY_END , TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||' ~ '|| TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY , FG_PUB , CD_COUPON_TARGET , CD_SALE_POLICY , VAL_SALE_POLICY , VAL_LIMIT_PRICE , TP_MEMBER , TO_CHAR(TC.DT_REG, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_REG , ID_REG_USER , TO_CHAR(TC.DT_UPT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_UPT , ID_UPT_USER , TDC.VAL_BRING_PIN_MANUAL AS CNT_DAUPIN FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON TC LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_DAUPIN_CONFIG TDC ON TDC.FG_USE = 'Y' AND CD_COUPON_OBJ IN ('3','4') WHERE 1 = 1
AND TO_DATE(#{DT_EXPIRY_END}||' 235959','YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') >= DT_EXPIRY_START
AND DT_EXPIRY_END >= TO_DATE(#{DT_EXPIRY_START}||' 000000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS')
AND TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{DT_EXPIRY_START_ORDER}
AND #{DT_EXPIRY_END_ORDER} = TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TC.DT_REG >= TO_DATE(#{DT_START_REG}||' 000000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS')
AND TO_DATE(#{DT_END_REG}||' 235959','YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') >= TC.DT_REG
AND CD_COUPON_OBJ =#{CD_COUPON_OBJ}
AND CD_COUPON =#{CD_COUPON}
AND UPPER(NM_COUPON) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{NM_COUPON})||'%'
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN DT_EXPIRY_START AND DT_EXPIRY_END
AND SYSDATE > DT_EXPIRY_END
ORDER BY CD_COUPON_OBJ, NO_COUPON_ORDER ASC
mapper.select: SELECT B.CODE_NAME AS CD_COUPON_OBJ , A.NM_COUPON , A.NO_REQ , TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY_START , TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY_END , TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(DT_EXPIRY_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY , CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN DT_EXPIRY_START AND DT_EXPIRY_END THEN '진행중' ELSE '종료' END AS CD_STATUS , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN WHERE CD_COUPON=A.CD_COUPON) AS CNT_ALLPIN , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN WHERE CD_COUPON=A.CD_COUPON AND DT_PUBLISH IS NOT NULL) AS CNT_PUBLISH , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN WHERE CD_COUPON=A.CD_COUPON AND DT_PUBLISH IS NOT NULL AND STATUS='A') AS CNT_USE , NVL(TDR.NO_DAUPIN_REQ, '0') AS YN_FLAG FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON A LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE B ON B.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_COUPON_OBJ' AND A.CD_COUPON_OBJ = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.TBS_DAUPIN_REQ TDR ON TDR.CD_COUPON = A.CD_COUPON AND TDR.DAUPIN_STATUS != '99' WHERE A.CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON}
SELECT ID_MEMBER , NM_MEMBER FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_MEMBER WHERE DS_EMAIL = #{DS_EMAIL_SEARCH}
mapper.update: UPDATE CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN SET ID_MEMBER=#{ID_MEMBER} , DT_PUBLISH=SYSDATE WHERE NO_PIN=(SELECT MIN(NO_PIN) FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN WHERE DT_PUBLISH IS NULL AND CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON})
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TBS_COUPON_PIN.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN ( NO_PIN , CD_COUPON , ID_MEMBER , STATUS , DT_PUBLISH , DT_REG , DT_EXPIRY_START , DT_EXPIRY_END ) SELECT #{NO_PIN}*1 , #{CD_COUPON} , #{ID_MEMBER} , 'N' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , CASE WHEN TP_EXPIRY_DATE = '00' THEN DT_EXPIRY_START ELSE SYSDATE END , CASE WHEN TP_EXPIRY_DATE = '00' THEN DT_EXPIRY_END ELSE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + TP_EXPIRY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')|| ' 235959' , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24MISS') END FROM TBS_COUPON WHERE CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(NO_DAUPIN_REQ) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS YN_CHECK FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_DAUPIN_REQ WHERE NO_REQ = #{NO_REQ} AND CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON} AND VALID_START = REPLACE(#{DT_EXPIRY_START},'-','') AND VALID_END = REPLACE(#{DT_EXPIRY_END},'-','') AND DAUPIN_STATUS != '99'

SELECT TC.CD_COUPON /* 쿠폰코드 */ , TC.CD_COUPON_OBJ /* 대상(딜리버리, 킹오더 등)*/ , OBJ.CODE_NAME AS NM_COUPON_OBJ , TC.NM_COUPON /* 쿠폰명 */ , TC.DS_COUPON /* 쿠폰설명 */ , TC.NO_COUPON_ORDER /* 쿠폰순서 */ , TO_CHAR(TC.DT_EXPIRY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY_START /* 유효기간시작일 */ , TO_CHAR(TC.DT_EXPIRY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_EXPIRY_END /* 유효기간종료일 */
, TC.TP_EXPIRY_DATE , CASE WHEN TC.TP_EXPIRY_DATE = '00' THEN '( '||TO_CHAR(TC.DT_EXPIRY_START,'YYYY-MM-DD') ||' ~ ' || TO_CHAR(TC.DT_EXPIRY_END,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' )' ELSE '' END AS DT_PIN_EXPIRY /* 쿠폰 핀 유효기간 */ , TC.FG_PUB /* 발행여부 */ , TC.CD_GOODS /* 다우상품코드 */ , TC.NM_GOODS /* 다우상품명 */ , TC.IMG_GOODS /* 다우상품이미지 */ , TC.CD_COUPON_TARGET /* 쿠폰대상(금액,상품) */
, TC.CD_SALE_POLICY /* 할인정책 */
, TC.VAL_SALE_POLICY /* 할인금액 */ , TC.VAL_LIMIT_PRICE /* 최소주문금액 */ , TC.PRODUCT_PK /* 할인상품 */ , OMA.MENU_NM AS NM_PROD /* 할인상품 */ , TC.PRODUCT_PK_REAL /* 실제판매상품 */ , OMA_REAL.MENU_NM AS NM_PROD_REAL /* 실제판매상품 */ , TC.TP_MEMBER /* 대상회원구분 */
, TO_CHAR(TC.DT_REG,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_REG /* 최초등록일시 */ , TC.ID_REG_USER /* 최초등록자 */ , TO_CHAR(TC.DT_UPT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT_UPT /* 최근수정일시 */ , TC.ID_UPT_USER /* 최근수정자 */ , TC.NO_REQ /* 다우계약번호 */ , SA_LIST.ATTACH_ID AS IMG_LIST /* 목록 이미지 */ , SA_DTL.ATTACH_ID AS IMG_DTL /* 상세 이미지 */ , SA_RWD.ATTACH_ID AS IMG_RWD /* 리워드 이미지 */ , TCP.CNT_PIN , TC.NM_CUP_MENU , TC.REAL_CUP_PRICE , TC.SALE_CUP_PRICE , TC.SALE_CUP_RATE FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON TC LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT_PIN FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_PIN WHERE CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON} ) TCP ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE OBJ ON OBJ.CODE = TC.CD_COUPON_OBJ AND OBJ.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_COUPON_OBJ'
LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE TARGET ON TARGET.CODE = TC.CD_COUPON_TARGET AND TARGET.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_COUPON_TARGET'
LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE POLICY ON POLICY.CODE = TC.CD_SALE_POLICY AND POLICY.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'CD_SALE_POLICY'
LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE TP_MEM ON TP_MEM.CODE = TC.TP_MEMBER AND TP_MEM.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'TP_MEMBER'
LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_CODE EXPIRY ON EXPIRY.CODE = TC.TP_EXPIRY_DATE AND EXPIRY.CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'TP_EXPIRY_DATE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_APP OMA ON OMA.MENU_CD = TO_CHAR(TC.PRODUCT_PK)
LEFT OUTER JOIN OMNI.OMNI_MENU_APP OMA_REAL ON OMA_REAL.MENU_CD = TO_CHAR(TC.PRODUCT_PK_REAL)
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SAL.ATTACH_ID, BIZ_KEY FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH_LINK SAL INNER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH SA ON SA.ATTACH_ID = SAL.ATTACH_ID WHERE BIZ_TP = 'COUPON' AND SA.ATTACH_TYPE = 'IMG_APP') SA_LIST ON SA_LIST.BIZ_KEY = TC.CD_COUPON LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SAL.ATTACH_ID, BIZ_KEY FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH_LINK SAL INNER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH SA ON SA.ATTACH_ID = SAL.ATTACH_ID WHERE BIZ_TP = 'COUPON' AND SA.ATTACH_TYPE = 'IMG_WEB') SA_DTL ON SA_DTL.BIZ_KEY = TC.CD_COUPON LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SAL.ATTACH_ID, BIZ_KEY FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH_LINK SAL INNER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH SA ON SA.ATTACH_ID = SAL.ATTACH_ID WHERE BIZ_TP = 'COUPON' AND SA.ATTACH_TYPE = 'IMG_REWARD') SA_RWD ON SA_RWD.BIZ_KEY = TC.CD_COUPON WHERE CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON}
SELECT SA.ATTACH_ID FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH SA LEFT OUTER JOIN CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH_LINK SAL ON SAL.ATTACH_ID = SA.ATTACH_ID WHERE SAL.BIZ_KEY = #{CD_COUPON} AND SAL.BIZ_TP = 'COUPON'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH ( ATTACH_ID , FILE_NM , FILE_PATH , FILE_SIZE , REG_DT , CONTENT_TYPE , ATTACH_TYPE , ATTACH_SUB_TYPE , FILE_CONTENT
) SELECT #{ATTACH_ID_NEW} , SA.FILE_NM , SA.FILE_PATH , SA.FILE_SIZE , SYSDATE , SA.CONTENT_TYPE , SA.ATTACH_TYPE , SA.ATTACH_SUB_TYPE , SA.FILE_CONTENT FROM CRMADMIN.SYS_ATTACH SA WHERE ATTACH_ID = #{ATTACH_ID}

INSERT INTO CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_STORE_EXCEPT ( NO_STORE_EXCEPT , ID_STORE_EXCEPT , NM_STORE_EXCEPT , CD_COUPON
) SELECT SEQ_TBS_COUPON_STORE_EXCEPT.NEXTVAL , ID_STORE_EXCEPT , NM_STORE_EXCEPT , #{CD_COUPON_NEW} FROM CRMADMIN.TBS_COUPON_STORE_EXCEPT WHERE CD_COUPON = #{CD_COUPON}
